seo.title: cho on the top exchanges
seo.description: The token that grows amidst the crypto winter — CHO is a utility token of the Choise.com ecosystem. Buy, send, spend, exchange, get passive income from your crypto holdings, and get additional bonuses as a CHO holder.

description.title: cho token — an entry point to the advantages of the choise.com products
description.description_1: With its global availability, and a variety of on-/off-ramps, Choise.com delivers complex yield-focused and cryptobanking products through a fun and friendly UI/UX.

tokenomics.title: cho tokenomics
tokenomics.description: based on cutting-edge practices from the industry

array.description: CHO tokenomics is presented by a deflationary model with the total number of 1 billion tokens subject to be burned over time
CHO holders take the advantage of the dynamic APYs, special benefits for users and partners, fee discounts and other bonuses.

The voting weight in the DAO is proportional to the amount of veCHO tokens distributed as LP-tokens for the CHO tokens locked in Charism. Every CHO holder can contribute to the meaningful evolution of the project

array.description: Gate.io is a well-established centralized exchange offering a great number of coins and trading pairs as well as a variety of DeFi mining products. It is rated as one of the top exchanges in terms of cybersecurity by CER.
